author: fwyzard
body:
* Move cuda-gdb wrapper to cuda.spec 

  * CUDA version 10.1.105
    Support for gcc 8 and clang 7.
    Include new Matrix Multiply library cublasLt.
    Various fxes to CUDA libraries and NVCC compiler.

  * NVIDIA drivers version 418.39

See https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/archive/10.1/cuda-toolkit-release-notes/index.html .
title: Update CUDA to version 10.1.105
